Prerequisite: Any divine class, must worship a deity of the destruction domain

Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate checks.

When you use a power associated with this feat and hit an unbloodied enemy with it, you deal 2 extra damage.. The extra damage increases to 3 at 11th level and 4 at 21st level.

Update (11/23/2009)

In the first sentence of the second paragraph of the Benefit line, replace "you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll" to "you deal 2 extra damage." In the subsequent sentence, replace "bonus" with "extra damage" and remove the "+" symbols.

Associated Powers:

Ardent Strike

,

Bond of Censure

,

Grasping Shards

,

Righteous Brand

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 111.
